tasks.task: Prepare cold frames for fall planting
subtasks: Harvest remaining herbs from existing cold frames
Move cold frames to new location
Clear and chip the area for the cold frames
Retrieve soil from the bottom of the hill
Fill containers with soil
Plant herbs and vegetables suited for the fall in the cold frames
Acknowledge and manage lightheadedness from exertion
Plan tasks to avoid overexertion, especially in hot weather
Use slow, incremental movements when shoveling or moving soil

Fill containers with soil
Plant herbs and vegetables suited for the fall in the cold frames

Prepare cold frames for fall planting
subtasks: Harvest remaining herbs from existing cold frames
Move cold frames to new location, considering physical limitations (slow movements to avoid lightheadedness)

tasks.task: Manage physical health during agricultural work
subtasks: Recognize signs of lightheadedness and body tension and take steps to alleviate symptoms, including staying hydrated and resting as needed
